title: Two's company apple crumble
ingredients: ['1 large cooking apple - peeled, cored and diced', '1 teaspoon dark corn syrup (or golden syrup)', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '150ml plain flour', '3 tablespoons caster sugar', '2 tablespoons rolled oats', '1 tablespoon desiccated coconut', '1 pinch salt', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla sugar', '50g butter, melted']
